name: @adobe/asset-compute-commons
description: Common utilities needed by all Adobe Asset Compute serverless actions

posttest-cross-os.darwin: eslint ./ && ./node_modules/lockfile-lint/bin/lockfile-lint.js --path package-lock.json —type npm --allowed-hosts npm artifactory.corp.adobe.com --allowed-schemes "https:" "file:" --empty-hostname true
posttest-cross-os.linux: eslint ./ && ./node_modules/lockfile-lint/bin/lockfile-lint.js --path package-lock.json —type npm --allowed-hosts npm artifactory.corp.adobe.com --allowed-schemes "https:" "file:" --empty-hostname true
posttest-cross-os.win32: eslint ../ && node_modules\lockfile-lint\bin\lockfile-lint.js --path package-lock.json —type npm --allowed-hosts npm artifactory.corp.adobe.com --allowed-schemes "https:" "file:" --empty-hostname true
